dk.aau.cs.giraf.wombat
Class WDialog

java.lang.Object
  Dialog
      dk.aau.cs.giraf.wombat.WDialog

public class WDialog
extends Dialog

This class is a custom dialog which is used for all dialogs in WOMBAT Layer: Layout

addButton

public void addButton(int textResource,
                      int buttonId,
                      View.OnClickListener listener)
Adds a new button to the dialog

Parameters:
textResource - The text on the button, resource id of any string
buttonId - Id the button is supposed to be set to, the identifier does not have to be unique in this view's hierarchy. The identifier should be a positive number.
listener - An OnClickListener, which handles the click events on the button, this can also be changed by using the setButtonClickListener method

addEditText

public void addEditText(java.lang.String text,
                        int editTextId)
Substitutes the linear layout with an edit text field

Parameters:
text - The start text of the edit text field
editTextId - The id of the edit text field, the identifier does not have to be unique in this view's hierarchy. The identifier should be a positive number.

getEditTextText

public java.lang.String getEditTextText(int editTextId)
Get the text currently in the edit text field

Parameters:
editTextId - Id of the edit text field added with the addEditText method
Returns:
Returns the text of the field if the id was valid, else returns an empty string
